reviewText: My family really enjoys these movies!  They are a great learning tool.  They have great picture.  I would recommend to to anyone with small children!
I absolutely love these videos. They help in teaching my family the gospel stories and basic values to live your life by.

I love these videos.  I have shown these videos to my kids since they were born and they love them.  I learn the best by visual learning and I enjoy the videos everytime I view them.  The only thing I wish they would do is if they would re-master them in DVD format so that the sound and video quality would be much better, but for what it cost and the important message it has its great.  Thanks, Marshal.
